violations.Violation Summary: Each camper is not under immediate visual observation and verbal contact with counselors during all activities
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Sufficient handwash sinks with hot and cold running water liquid soap drying devices not provided in comercial buildings
